amendment.description: To provide for the use of funds to ensure that survivors of domestic violence and sexual assault do not face housing discrimination.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3476 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3476 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5499) To provide for the use of funds to ensure that survivors of domestic violence and sexual assault do not face housing discrimination.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3476 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3476 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
